originalText.text: I am honored to leave a review for Dr. Marie Pierrot, PA.  Dr. Pierrot was very thorough.  She listened to all my concerns.  She answered all my questions.  There was no rush in her.  By that I mean she did not hurry me along.  She was very respectful, professional and made me very comfortable.  I am scheduled for a follow-up with her in a few weeks.   I am confident that she (and her team) will bring the same level of professionalism.  Thank you Dr. Pierrot for your interest in my health.

originalText.text: WONDERFUL experience.  Dr.Pierrot took  her time reviewing my care. She explained things clearly to me and answered all my questions.  It is obvious that she cares about her patients and I appreciated it.

text.text: WONDERFUL experience.  Dr.Pierrot took  her time reviewing my care. She explained things clearly to me and answered all my questions.  It is obvious that she cares about her patients and I appreciated it.

originalText.text:
Grateful to have  Dr Pierrot as my servicing provider. She is attentive and thoroughly informs me of my lab results and treatment plan.

She appropriately utilizes "MyChart" app to keep me informed, well as make the recommended referrals needed to specialty care providers.

originalText.text: Dr. Pierrot and I got off to a great start. I feel confident that I’m in good hands. She was very courteous, thorough and professional. I look forward to being cared for by Dr Pierrot.

originalText.text: Dr Marie Pierrot was very thorough in her examination, asked a lot of questions pertaining to my issue, addressed all my concerns.
